scripts.prep: copyfiles analytics.js dist && concat node_modules/material-design-lite/material.min.js node_modules/seedrandom/seedrandom.min.js > dist/lib.js
scripts.build-wp: cross-env NODE_ENV=development INDEX_TS=playground.ts DIST_FOLDER=dist BUNDLE_NAME=bundle webpack
scripts.build-wp:watch: cross-env NODE_ENV=development INDEX_TS=playground.ts DIST_FOLDER=dist BUNDLE_NAME=bundle webpack --watch
scripts.build: npm run prep && npm run build-js && npm run build-css && npm run build-html
scripts.build2: npm run clean && npm run prep && npm run build-css && npm run build-html && npm run build-wp
scripts.build2:watch: npm run clean && npm run prep && npm run build-css && npm run build-html && npm run build-wp:watch
scripts.watch: npm run prep && concurrently "npm run watch-js" "npm run watch-css" "npm run watch-html"
scripts.build-tf: npm run clean && mkdirp ./dist && npm run prep && cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack
scripts.build-tf:watch: npm run clean && mkdirp ./dist && npm run prep && cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack --watch
